targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  queries_running
FROM database_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  queries_total
FROM database_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  bytes_available_perc
FROM vw_disk_space_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  disk_ro_rate
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  disk_rb_rate
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  cpu_idle
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  cpu_sys
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  load1::decimal
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  queries_blocked
FROM database_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  queries_queued
FROM database_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime,$__interval),
  ROUND(100*SUM(mem_actual_free::DECIMAL)/SUM(mem_total::DECIMAL), 2) AS "mem_actual_free_perc"
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  disk_wo_rate
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  disk_wb_rate
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  cpu_user
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  load0::decimal
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  load2::decimal
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  hostname AS metric,
  bytes_available_perc
FROM vw_disk_space_history_perhost
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  hostname AS metric,
  bytes_available
FROM vw_disk_space_history_perhost
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  bytes_available
FROM vw_disk_space_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  bytes_available_perc
FROM vw_disk_space_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  hostname AS metric,
  bytes_used_perc
FROM vw_disk_space_history_perhost
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  hostname AS metric,
  bytes_used
FROM vw_disk_space_history_perhost
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  bytes_used
FROM vw_disk_space_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  bytes_used_perc
FROM vw_disk_space_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime,$__interval),
  hostname AS metric,
  sum(mem_actual_used) AS "mem_total"
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
GROUP BY 1, hostname,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime,$__interval),
  sum(mem_total) / sum(mem_actual_used) AS "mem_total"
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime,$__interval),
  sum(mem_actual_used) AS "mem_total"
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
